result.reason: Multiple root nodes support improves connection organization and flexibility, addressing a user request and aligning with recent architectural updates.
result.approach: Update ConnectionTreeModel to support a collection of root nodes, modify UI components to render and manage multiple roots, and adjust XML serialization logic for persistence.
